articles.title: Xbox Game Pass new additions leak ahead of official announcement - TrueAchievements
articles.description: It appears that December's new Xbox Game Pass additions have leaked ahead of an official reveal. Far Cry 6, Goat Simulator 3, and more will join Game Pass soon.
articles.content:
• Rise of the Tomb Raider143 Achievements worth 6,271 TA (2,250 GS)
  • World War Z35 Achievements worth 4,314 TA (1,000 GS)
  • Far Cry 699 Achievements worth 5,609 TA (2,010 GS)
